mapper.select: SELECT B.* FROM (SELECT A.*, ROWNUM AS RN FROM (SELECT * FROM FAQ WHERE F_CATEGORY = #{param3} AND F_CATEGORY BETWEEN 1 AND 4 ORDER BY F_NO DESC) A) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO FAQ (F_NO, F_TITLE, F_CONTENT, F_CATEGORY , F_REGDATE) VALUES (FAQ_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, SYSDATE)
